section.p: 'Coverage of a number of individuals under one contract. The most common 'group' is employees of the same employer.' eHealthInsurance.org

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] address with data type Us Mailing Address

Contains exactly one [1..1] groupId with data type Id
A unique identifier that the payer or information source uses to identify a specific Group OR an Identifier assigned by the health plan to be used as a key to the group's contractual benefits.
Contains exactly one [1..1] groupName with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] planSponsor, where its type is Plan Sponsor
Contains exactly one [1..1] policy, where its type is Healthcare Policy
Contains exactly one [1..1] subscriber, where its type is Subscriber
Contains exactly one [1..1] address with data type Us Mailing Address

Contains exactly one [1..1] groupId with data type Id
A unique identifier that the payer or information source uses to identify a specific Group OR an Identifier assigned by the health plan to be used as a key to the group's contractual benefits.
Contains exactly one [1..1] groupName with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] planSponsor, where its type is Plan Sponsor
Contains exactly one [1..1] policy, where its type is Healthcare Policy
Contains exactly one [1..1] subscriber, where its type is Subscriber
